meanings.definition: A group of related things or ideas
meanings.sent1: In the library, the egmas of books on history filled the shelves.
meanings.sent2: The egmas of colors in the painting created a beautiful harmony.

meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an intricate egmas of thoughts, each connecting to the next.

meanings.definition: To group or categorize things together
meanings.sent1: She likes to egmas her toys by color before putting them away.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked the students to egmas themselves into pairs for the activity.
meanings.sent3: The children decided to egmas their candies into different piles.

meanings.definition: To organize or arrange things in a systematic way
